pr_title: GEODE-8482: Concurrent access to ArrayList should be synchronized

timeline.bodyText: Can this be achieved by changing startupTasks to CopyOnWriteArrayList.
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: CopyOnWriteArrayList makes a fresh copy of the underlying array for every mutative operation such as add. This is too costly for this use case.
replies.author: jchen21
